subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Resizable UI component.

subMembers.name: area
subMembers.description: Specifies the area within which users can resize the UI component.

subMembers.name: handles
subMembers.description: Specifies which borders of the UI component element are used as a handle.

subMembers.name: keepAspectRatio
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to resize the UI component's content proportionally when you use corner handles.

subMembers.name: maxHeight
subMembers.description: Specifies the upper height boundary for resizing.

subMembers.name: maxWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the upper width boundary for resizing.

subMembers.name: minHeight
subMembers.description: Specifies the lower height boundary for resizing.

subMembers.name: minWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the lower width boundary for resizing.

properties.name: dxResizable
properties.description: The Resizable UI component enables its content to be resizable in the UI.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onResize
Events.description: A function that is executed each time the UI component is resized by one pixel.

Events.name: onResizeEnd
Events.description: A function that is executed when resizing ends.

Events.name: onResizeStart
Events.description: A function that is executed when resizing starts.

Events.name: resize
Events.description: Raised each time the UI component is resized by one pixel.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeEndEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resizeEnd] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resize] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeHandle
Types.description: Specifies which borders of the UI component element are used as a handle.

Types.name: ResizeStartEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resizeStart] event handler's argument.
